oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carl Cowan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Embracing Citizenship
Public Education
African American lawyers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Informal photograph, possibly from a newspaper, of a man in a suit.
Carl Cowan was the lead attorney in the 1939-1942 case to desegregate the University of Tennessee law school.
